docs.snippet: All experiene shows that sudden changes in the habits of life, whether as it regards the article of food, colthing or exercise, as well as climate, operate directly upon the physical health of those who may be subjected to them.
docs.lead_paragraph: All experiene shows that sudden changes in the habits of life, whether as it regards the article of food, colthing or exercise, as well as climate, operate directly upon the physical health of those who may be subjected to them.

docs.snippet: The Philadelphia Ledger says: Last evening, Lieut McFarland of Company A, Third Pennsylvania Regiment, arrived in this city from Marrtinsburgh, with five rebel prisoners, who give the following names: ROBERT CHAMBERS, JOHN J. HIBBS, JOHN WILD JOHN...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Ledger says: Last evening, Lieut McFarland of Company A, Third Pennsylvania Regiment, arrived in this city from Marrtinsburgh, with five rebel prisoners, who give the following names: ROBERT CHAMBERS, JOHN J. HIBBS, JOHN WILD JOHN LEMON and THOMAS M. HOLLIS.
